tswitem.name: Blessed Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Blessed Augment Resonator
An unattuned survivability augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will give you a beneficial effect that increases your magical and physical protection by 15/ 30/ 45/ 60/ 75 for 5 seconds whenever you activate this ability.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 2 Attuned Robust Augment Resonators
  • 12 Pure pentagram runes
  • 12 Pure koru runes
  • 36 Pure water
